step.name: README
step.action: tsenv.exe "README=This task sequence demonstrates using DISM commands to modify the rollback options set after upgrade. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/dism-uninstallos-command-line-options for more information." /hiddenflag:False

defaultVarList.variable: This task sequence demonstrates using DISM commands to modify the rollback options set after upgrade. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/dism-uninstallos-command-line-options for more information.

group.name: /Remove-OSUninstall
group.description: Remove the ability to roll back if Windows Setup completed successfully. Checks _SMSTSOSUpgradeActionReturnCode before running to ensure upgrade has completed.

step.name: Set /Remove-OSUninstall
step.description: Remove the ability to roll back a PC to the previous installation of Windows

group.name: /Set-OSUninstallWindow
group.description: Set the time limit in days for rollback if Windows Setup completed successfully. Checks _SMSTSOSUpgradeActionReturnCode before running to ensure upgrade has completed.

step.name: /Set-OSUninstallWindow
step.description: /Set-OSUninstallWindow /Value:<days> - change the days value as needed
